songs.title: NBA On ESPN
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah
2 Chainz

[Verse: 2 Chainz and Lebron James]
Kyrie and Gordon Hayward back
I hope this season the stay intact
First pick went to AZ, second pick went straight to SAC
Melo play for Houston now
D-Wade still hoopin' now
Bron-Bron on the Lake Show
This city was built on stars
Jack Nicholson on the front row
This City breeds winners and I'm a winner
Season here, yeah say your prayers
Spurs and Raptors swapped players
I think we got us a change of plan
G-iannis is a grow man
Big Cuz on Golden State
Get there early please don't be late
New York Knicks got a new coach
Markelle Fultz got a new stroke
Swish
